snake_toxins.description: Snake venom toxin sequences and metadata from various species

antibody_structures.description: Antibody structure data including PDB files and metadata

plant_expression.description: Plant expression systems data with yields and characteristics

antivenom_research.description: Previous research on plant-based antivenom production

preprocessing_applied: FASTA parsing and structured format conversion
Toxin sequence extraction and length calculation
data_limitations: Limited experimental validation data for antibody-toxin binding
Sparse information on plant expression optimization for specific antibodies
Incomplete coverage of all snake species
recommendations: Collect additional experimental data on antibody-toxin binding
Generate more plant-specific expression optimization data
Develop a validation dataset with known neutralization efficacy
